name: P-Walker's Simulation
description: In this game, you control Paul, a man that faces many obstacles in both life and death.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: i3 @ 2.30GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 520 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 @3.1GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar card Storage: 8 GB available space
